content: Quite right, thanks Mathilde. This works best — if not only — when you’re on a B2B play, which you implied when touching on community. I wonder how we could go about a public roadmap for a pure B2C play? And, to make it spicier, in an environment only starting to embrace technology ? For instance, think about a mass-market product in an emerging market sharing an open roadmap via WhatsApp. It could be an interesting experiment…
